original_text: When Jehoram had ascended the throne of his father and was established, he killed all his brothers with the sword, and also some of the princes of Israel.
korean_text: 여호람이 그의 아버지의 왕국을 다스리게 되어 세력을 얻은 후에 그의 모든 아우들과 이스라엘 방백들 중 몇 사람을 칼로 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: When Jehoram had ascended the throne of his father
he killed all his brothers with the sword,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 칼로 그의 모든 형제를 죽였으며

sentences.original_text: and also some of the princes of Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 방백 중 몇 사람도 죽였다
